get.description: Send deploy hash from CasperHolders Website to be counted in the prometheus counter metric

204.description: Return nothing. The counter is automatically incremented.

404.description: If the deploy doesn't have a result or isn't a supported type or casper client crash or override api isn't reachable it returns a 404

get.description: Fetch the metrics from your prometheus instance or from the override url provided.

200.description: Return the metrics in the prometheus format

404.description: If the override api or the prometheus isn't reachable it returns a 404
